name: Line (ZiweiZhang)
description:
One day, you are asked to help an old lady to fix its internet. She lives far away from the city. You drive for a long time but eventually get lost. You don’t want to do your job any more. In this weird forest, your only goal is to find a way home. However, the weird monster, strange mist, and freaky old lady all hinder you back home. Is that your destiny? Can you find the truth? Instead of cruel reality, a good dream might be better? 

This is a text-based game. Just try different lines to get the truth behind the story.

Made by Ziwei Zhang for IMS 445
